text: @thehill Nancy Pelosi is a stupid woman who instead of helping The American People would rather waste time and put the American People in danger ,Democrats want #greendeal Illegal Immigrants visas more idiotic demands that have nothing to do with the #coronavirus ! Democrats don’t care!
